description: Movie Studio and Video Pro X are video editors for casual and professional users in Windows. When you first save a project in Movie Studio or Video Pro X, the program creates an MVP file to store the contents of the project. You can also save backups of projects as MVP files by selecting File â†’ Backup copy .
NOTE: Movie Studio was formerly known as Movie Edit Pro.
